pr_title: Add snapshot dependencies layer in explode mode for standard jar.

timeline.body:
I think it's okay to embed the predicate. And I think the name 'isSnapshot' is fine in this local scope.
```suggestion
              .filter(isSnapshot.negate())
```
timeline.bodyText:
I think it's okay to embed the predicate. And I think the name 'isSnapshot' is fine in this local scope.
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                          .filter(isNotSnapshotDependency)
          
          
            
                          .filter(isSnapshot.negate())
timeline.bodyHTML:
I think it's okay to embed the predicate. And I think the name 'isSnapshot' is fine in this local scope.

Suggested change
.filter(isNotSnapshotDependency)
.filter(isSnapshot.negate())
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.body:
For consistency, let's use the name as defined by `JavaContainerBuilder.LayerType`.
```suggestion
            FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName("dependencies");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
For consistency, let's use the name as defined by JavaContainerBuilder.LayerType.

Suggested change
FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName("nonSnapshotDependencies");
FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName("dependencies");
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyHTML:
Likewise,

Suggested change
FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName("snapshotDependencies");
FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName("snapshot dependencies");
timeline.author: chanseokoh
